name: RogueSpace
description:
A collaborative project between 4 students at Staffordshire University (+Nick).

RogueSpace is a simple shoot'em'up where the player is making an incursion into rogue sectors of space, infested with a variety of hostile alien ships.

  • Destroy enemies to get score.
  • The higher your score is, the more upgrades you'll unlock within the game!
  • Defeat bosses to get an upgrade.
  • Push on through rogue space to rack up a high score, but be careful, it gets hard.

Credits

Programmer: Christopher Southorn

Design: Jay Leverton

Modelling + Texturing: Chris Horton and Josh Stanley

Music: Nick Horton
